title: GCP Outage
author: thanhhaimai
aiHeadline: Google Cloud's latest outage proves that even the best can crash—just like your Wi-Fi on a Monday morning.

title: A receipt printer cured my procrastination
author: laurieherault
aiHeadline: A receipt printer is the new productivity hack—because who can resist the sound of a printer that says 'Work now or regret it later'?

title: Frequent reauth doesn't make you more secure
author: ingve
aiHeadline: Frequent reauthentication: the cybersecurity equivalent of shouting 'Fire!' in a crowded theater—because panic doesn't keep you safe.

title: US-backed Israeli company's spyware used to target European journalists
aiHeadline: US-backed spyware targets European journalists—because nothing says 'We're on your side' like stealing your data.

title: Air India flight to London crashes in Ahmedabad with more than 240 onboard
author: Gud
aiHeadline: Air India flight crashes, proving that even when you're halfway to London, gravity doesn't care about your travel plans.
